text: The Copa Chile 1994 was the 24th edition of the Chilean Cup tournament. The competition started on March 5, 1994, and concluded on August 24, 1994. Colo- Colo won the competition for their fourth time, beating O'Higgins on penalties in the final. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" ! Round !!
